pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linux eduVPN client and Python API==================================This is the GNU/Linux desktop client for eduVPN. It also is a Python client API.Read more about eduVPN on the eduVPN website http://eduvpn.org/.Installation============The recommended way to install the eduVPN client for Linux is using one of the packages for your Linux distribution.The online documentation at [http://python-eduvpn-client.readthedocs.io](http://python-eduvpn-client.readthedocs.io)contains detailed installation instructions.To directly install eduVPN from a checkout of this repository run:```bash$ python3 -m venv venv$ venv/bin/pip install ".[gui]"```
